Jurgen Klopp: “Thiago has trained in part with the team so far, but on Friday [Christmas Day], he trained the full session. But it was a reduced session so we couldn't do that [full session].” #awlfc [liverpool echo]

Klopp: “He just has to be part of team training [more]. It's not about being part of team training one day and then you can play football in the Premier League. So it looks quite promising at the moment but I cannot say more about it, to be honest. I don't know.”

Klopp: "I think the plan was that if he trains [on Monday] completely normally then we will see.”

Divock Origi’s situation has been discussed today at the Italian side, the Belgium is said to be attracted to the idea of moving to the Italian side mainly because of Lukaku’s influence. #LFC are said to be open to the idea of a loan move which attracts Inter. [@CorSport]

The newspaper claims that today the Italian club has made both technical and economic valuations for Origi, and will analyze the possibility of bringing him. [@CorSport]

Divock Origi’s situation has been discussed today at the Italian side, the Belgium is said to be attracted to the idea of moving to the Italian side mainly because of Lukaku’s influence. #LFC are said to be open to the idea of a loan move which attracts Inter. [@CorSport]

The newspaper claims that today the Italian club has made both technical and economic valuations for Origi, and will analyze the possibility of bringing him. [@CorSport]
